column2: text
The Desert Spirits advise me otherwise, but I will accept your proposal.
You have my word, but not my confidence. Now go away!
I hope spirits don't punish me for this.
You can't imagine the riches of Araby, how do you intend to possess them?
What kind of arrogance leads you to demand something from the great Jaffar?
Slavery seems to me a better destination for you, stranger.
Araby does not kneel before anyone, leave, or I will lose my patience.
By the seven fathers of Mu'Allid! No!
May your soul be flayed by the Djinns!
My executioners will be happy to give you an answer.
The Arabyans have little patience, I advise you to speak quickly.
The punishment of the desert awaits you if your words do not please me.
How dare you crawl before Al-Haikk's throne, filth?
Our alliance will be like an oasis between the sea of dunes.
Your gods smile at you, friend, the throne of Araby is with you.
An insignificant payment, but if you settle for this, good for you.
Rejoice, the jewel of the desert has given you its blessing.
It is a pleasure to help an ally. Soon we will share the spoils of war.
Our empires will grow together, as brothers, as one.
The Spirits are furious, and I must not oppose their will.
Dark are these days. We will not answer your pleas.
My heart grieves but I will have to refuse.
The palaces of Araby give you a warm welcome, ally.
The Al-Haikk throne welcomes his friends with luxuries, enjoy whatever you want.
Drink, food, concubines, all our wealth is at your disposal, friend.
My emirs agree with that.
May the Djinns be witnesses of our pact.
Araby's coffers overflow with wealth, but we will never refuse a gift.
Power and wealth, what a man seeks, what a man needs.
May this gold bless our eternal alliance.
I see that cunning lives inside you. Welcome you!
I will have them prepare tialva and arag. We must celebrate!
Our future will be glorious. The world will tremble as we pass.
Disappointment is what I feel, friend. I considered you wiser.
The weak cannot survive under the punishment of the desert.
The Spirits are furious, you better leave my presence.
If you have gods, you better start praying now.
Your insolence is an insult. If you think you can reject me, fate will torment you.
You better leave, our scimitars are thirsty.
A distant power calls me, and soon the world will know its strength.
Against the powers that I will unleash, no one can oppose.
I am Jaffar, remember that name, it will be the last thing your people will hear.
I think our presence here should not be prolonged.
Dark days are approaching, because darker are the hearts of men.
What am I going to ally with weak vermin? Without your strength you are nothing
By Kasoun's fiery sword, war call us!
Wealth and glory await us, the whole world will be our kingdom.
Come on friend, follow me to war, how much you want, there you will find it.
The tribute is necessary for those who can only serve.
Ancient is our civilization, wise are our advisers. Attend to their requests.
Feel honored, because you are in the presence of the sovereign Jaffar.
When I rule the world, you will be my most loyal vassal.
I don't know who you think you are dealing with, but my kingdom does not break for anyone.
Terrible is my anger, I just pray that you won't wake it.
Pathetic, simply pathetic.
We have common interests, submit the world to our will.
If the winds of war rise, only cowards are left behind.
Our banners will cover the skies. Follow me, allies.
Enough blood has been spilled, my people crave calm.
The gods are saddened by this massacre, it is time to return to the desired peace.
Do you really want to continue with this nonsense? It is not typical of someone as noble as you.
Our names will go down in history as emperors and conquerors. You don't want such glory?
The drums of war resonate, but a distant whisper cries out for revenge.
May our hordes cover the dunes. We march to war!
Just a small gift, because gold is simple water in Araby.
These jewels are the most precious treasures of our mountains. I hope you know how to appreciate them.
The golden springs of our palaces shine like an oasis, because that is the Araby wealth.
You have arrived in Araby, the land of gold and sand, speak now.
I am Jaffar, ruler of the sand, scourge of the Al Nehekharin, the great sorcerer. Talk now, traveler.
You arrive before the throne of Al-Haikk, stranger, make your pleas.
My people crave war, and it won't be me who will stop them.
You will only have peace when the chains surround your hands!
Never! Only death will bring us peace!
Araby is old and sovereign, we don't need to join you.
We will rule sovereigns. We will rule forever.
Your power does not compare to our magnificence. Go away.
The sands rise. You will know the name of Araby!
The day has come. The wrath of the desert will shake this world.
In the name of the Djinns, my anger will reach every corner of this world.
Thank the mercy of the Sultan of the Seas, because today I will let you go alive.
My scimitar still burns, you better not betray me.
My Djinns can wipe out entire worlds, I hope you don't forget.
If you want riches, you just have to travel the seas and get them.
I'm the great Gilded King of Copher reborn, do you think I'm going to obey you?
He will not want me to accept this.
You're a fool if you think I need something from you.
Great urns I keep in my cellars. Leave if you don't want to contemplate their power.
I have the absolute power of the spirits, do you want to take it away from me?
Fire, wind, water. Every element obeys me. You better not provoke my anger.
How dare you present yourself in front of the Flaming Scimitar? The spirits urge me to destroy you.
The Sultan of the Flames only grants hell to his enemies. Should I do the same?
You better talk carefully, my Sea Nymphs dwell in the abyss, and want to take you with them.
All the oceans will tremble before the Sultan of the Seas and his allies.
It is an honor for me to count on your support.
This ship is full of unparalleled wealth, take their gold if you wish, friend.
From Sartosa to Lustria, our legend will be eternal.
I see the legends about your wisdom were true, friend.
He will be glad of this, I am sure.
Terrible winds rise today, we must not fight them.
We must not fight fate, it is indomitable, uncontrollable.
If you knew what I see in the future, you would be more cautious in your actions.
The best spices and the most beautiful concubines await us. Come, ally.
The Flaming Scimitar is a pleasure barge, feel free to enjoy as much as you want.
I am willing to share with you my wisdom, friend, even the most terrible secrets.
Maybe fate has united us for some strange reason.
My captains advise me to accept this agreement. It is a pleasure for me to collaborate.
Shining gold is what my corsairs are looking for, but my curiosity wants lost and distant secrets.
I thank you deeply, the Flaming Scimitar wineries will be filled with these gifts.
This gold is a pact, an alliance between men. I promise to bring you the finest silk from Cathay on my next trip.
I knew that my hope was not vain with your people.
My ship's sails fill with a fresh wind, it's a good omen.
You will not regret this act in all eternity, I promise you.
Djinns know ancient secrets, you may regret this.
Do you dare to challenge me? The Sultan of the Seas is not afraid of anyone.
I will consider this as an act of sad betrayal.
I dominate powers that escape your understanding, be careful with your actions.
Many consider me a simple merchant. They do not know the magnitude of their error.
I can perceive your soul, I can perceive your craving for betrayal.
The Efreets are eager to roar, their fiery song will fill the world with flames.
The Flaming Scimitar is ready, everyone who opposes us will end up under the endless sea.
He knows how this will end, he knows how you will die.
You don't know how sorry I am, but times must change.
What in the past was glory, is only a distant memory.
Time has revealed your weakness, your true nature.
The terrible winds of the Tempest Djinns will destroy our enemies.
Believe my promise, destiny is in our favor.
Follow us! They will only be puppets when we finish their strength.
Gold is beautiful music for me, the metal that rules the world.
As the patriarch of the Colleges of Magic, my wisdom is second to none.
The Flaming Scimitar rises before you, say your message.
An infinity of magic jars I keep in my ship. Each of them keeps the power of a god.
I have contemplated the most fearsome horrors in the world. I'm not going to fear someone like you.
Any of my captains is more capable and braver than you. I invite you to leave.
Do you see those skeletons of hideous sea-monsters? I have submitted to the sea itself. Doesn't your pretension seem arrogant?
The curses of my ever-burning blade want to go into combat. Let's not make them wait
Everything they hide has ceased to be secret. His conspiracies are empty.
It is time to show you the unstoppable force of destiny.
My beloved friend, why does this terrible violence devour us?
Wouldn't you think of continuing a war with a poor merchant?
In every corner of the world my brothers hide, and each one of them will seek revenge if I fall.
I have seen the future! And only glory and power will we get.
This has to happen, because it is his will, the eternal wheel of destiny.
The Raging Tempest will push us to our victory.
From our friendship, this gold belongs to you.
Silks, exotic spices, narcotic incense, concubines. Your wishes will be fulfilled here.
The Flaming Scimitar gives you its blessing, all the wealth you can imagine.
I am Golden Magus, the Sultan of the Seas, it is a pleasure to receive you.
I am the great Gilded King of Copher reborn, sovereign of the seas and the sands. Speak up, stranger.
Before the Flaming Scimitar you are, I am Magus, lord of all seas.
His will is very different from peace, he only longs for the future.
Your pleas do not fill my heart. I see no reason to forgive your life.
You will only have one peace. The one that he grants you, if you are that lucky.
My reign over the seas is supreme, no one can equal me.
I will have to resuscitate, sadly, the rivers of destiny do not recover that place.
Your power is worthy of admiration, but no sovereign will rule over the Flaming Scimitar.
My powers are infinite, my knowledge is unparalleled. You can never oppose me.
The Efreets will calcine your soul, the Desert Spirits will fall on your people, and the Sea-Nymphs will take all your hope.
Only one fate I see for you. Chained in the ports of Lashiek, serving forever.
I will surely regret making this deal.
I swear on the sands not to betray you, I hope not to regret it.
For your sake, I hope your wisdom overcomes your foolishness. My people are not as lenient as I am.
The relics of the Scythans will never end up in foreign hands.
I suggest you accept this deal, you have little choice.
For the good of your people, accept this treaty.
Innocent people should not suffer foolish leaders. Accept this deal for their sake.
Fool! The Scythans kneel to no master but our benefactor.
Never! Woe to those who think of us a simple, gullible people.
You have no authority or permission to be here. Leave my realm. Now.
My men are eager to welcome you as you deserve. Don't provoke my anger, stranger.
I will forever defend the Scythan people, with my life if necessary. Never forget it.
You are not deserving of the hospitality of the Scythans. Away with you!
A fair deal, with a fair ruler.
I'm always eager to trade with a friend of the Scythans.
Help us now and reap the benefits in the future. The Scythans are grateful people.
Please, accept the gifts of the Scythan people.
I can tell you are a ruler who does the best for their people. You will surely see the good in this deal.
Come! Let us unite our strength against the Forces of Darkness!
I'm sorry. not this time, friend.
A generous deal, but I must reject it.
Maybe in the future, for now, I plead you to wait.
Come, rest at our camp. The hospitality of the Scythans is well known.
Please, come to my tent, we have... much to discuss.
You are a guest and a friend of the Scythan people. I trust you'll appreciate what this means.
For the good of my people, I accept.
I trust you to uphold your part of the deal.
In the name of the Scythans, I accept this gift.
Thank you, this will help my people.
I never forget those who have been generous to me.
I'm glad we could come to an agreement.
Good, You'll find I can be very generous to my friends.
We always honour our alliances, my oath is as solid as iron.
Cursed traitor! I should've known better.
Oathbreaker! You are not to be trusted.
I knew we couldn't trust foreigners.
You dare to scorn the good will of the Scythans? Fool.
Your mind has grown dark. You will regret that response.
Very well then. Leave my camp. NOW.
You are making a mistake. Our steeds will trample over your corpse.
Fine. Your people could do with a wiser ruler anyway.
I will forever defend my people. FOREVER!
I see no benefit to the Scythans in the continuation of this deal.
No more treaties with tyrants.
Your words will deceive us no more.
Join us in our war. We can forge a better world together.
Come, join us in battle, the tightest bond with a Scythan is found in battle.
Join me in battle now and be showered in riches later.
Please, do this for the safety of both our peoples.
I trust you will see the good in keeping relations up with me.
I can be very generous to my friends. Remember that.
A proof of Scythan kindness. Be a good guest and accept it.
I don't see how this deal will help my people.
Do not underestimate me, or the Scythan people.
The desert welcomes fools like you with open arms.
Be a friend to the Scythans and have a loyal ally forever.
The Forces of Darkness will tremble at our combined might!
Come, let us make a better world for our peoples, together.
No more bloodshed. Please, this must end.
Do you not see what this war is doing to both our peoples? End this.
Let us end this pointless brawl, and let me return to take care of my people.
The Scythans ride with you.
The reign of darkness ends here. I am with you.
As I swore in my oath, I will ride with you, always.
You've been good to the Scythans. Accept this.
Let it not be said that Prince Fatandira is not generous.
Please, use these gifts for the greater good of your people.
The Scythans greet you, stranger.
I'm Prince Fatandira. I offer you the hospitality of my tent.
Come, you'll see my realm is both prosperous and enlightened.
Fool! You will fall.
The Scythans will end you!
Ilyriaâ€™s teats! What a fool!
No. The Scythans will ride forever free.
The Scythans are not simple traitors. Our oath is eternal.
I shall never kneel.
Tyrant! For the good of your people, you need to be brought down!
Your people need proper guidance.
You have betrayed the trust of Fatandira, and now you will pay!
